jcr:content.jcr:title: United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest 1971

contentheadline.headline: United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest 1971

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{ESC National Year | Year = 1971 | Country = United Kingdom | Preselection = [[A Song For Europe]] | Preselection date = 12 February 1971 | Entrant = [[Clodagh Rodgers]] | Song = [[Jack in the Box (song)|Jack in the Box]] | Final result = 4th, 98 points }} The United Kingdom held a national preselection to choose the song that would go to the [[Eurovision Song Contest]] 1971. It was held on 20 February 1971 and presented by [[Cliff Richard]]. ==Results== <TABLE BORDER="1" CELLPADDING="2" CELLSPACING="0"> <TR STYLE="BACKGROUND:#EFEFEF;"> <TH>Artist</TH> <TH>Song</TH> <TH>Place</TH> </TR> <TR> <TD>[[Clodagh Rodgers]]</TD> <TD>Look Left, Look Right</TD> <TD>5</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD>[[Clodagh Rodgers]]</TD> <TD>In my World of Beautiful Things</TD> <TD>6</TD> </TR> <TR STYLE="BACKGROUND:#FFDEAD;"> <TD>[[Clodagh Rodgers]]</TD> <TD>Jack in the Box</TD> <TD>1</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD>[[Clodagh Rodgers]]</TD> <TD>Another Time, Another Place</TD> <TD>4</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD>[[Clodagh Rodgers]]</TD> <TD>Wind of Change</TD> <TD>2</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD>[[Clodagh Rodgers]]</TD> <TD>Someone to Love me</TD> <TD>2</TD> </TR> <TR> <TD COLSPAN="3" STYLE="BACKGROUND:#EFEFEF;"><span style="font-size:100%;">The table is ordered by appearance.</span></TD> </TR> </TABLE> Due to a postal strike, regional votes were announced for each song. "Jack in the Box" won the national and went on to come 4th in the contest. {{UK in Eurovision}} {{Eurovision Song Contest 1971}} {{DEFAULTSORT:United Kingdom In The Eurovision Song Contest 1971}} [[Category:United Kingdom in the Eurovision Song Contest]] [[Category:Countries in the Eurovision Song Contest 1971]] [[Category:1971 in the United Kingdom|Eurovision Song Contest]]
